attributes.action: Zero hour contract is ab abuse to human toil!
attributes.additional_details: As part of the general attack on staff terms and conditions that has accompanied the intensification of privatisation and cuts to funding across the public services, employers have increasingly been turning to zero hours contracts. Under these contracts, an individual typically undertakes to be available for work but the employer does not undertake to provide any work and only pays for the hours worked.this inhuman act must be stopped so that a level of certainty can be created among the lives of common Men!
